content: {"name": "Salvation Army Clearwater", "alternate_name": "", "description": "May provide support with other services", "email": "", "url": "https://www.salvationarmyusa.org/usn/plugins/gdosCenterSearch?query=33756&mode=query_3&limit=40", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1521 Druid Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Clearwater", "state_province": "FL", "postal_code": "33756", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 27.9566105, "longitude": -82.7737722}, "phones": [{"number": "(727) 446-4177", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
